selector: [role=banner], [role=complementary], [role=contentinfo], [role=main], [role=navigation], [role=region], [role=search], [role=form], form, footer, header, aside, main, nav, section

messages.pass: Landmarks must have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination.
messages.fail: The landmarks do not have a unique role or role/label/title combination (use aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable).
